title: Drawing, Design for Serving Table of Mahogany and Inlay, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Serving Table of Mahogany and Inlay
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: Inscribed on pen and black ink, lower right corner: Serving Table / of Mahogany with Inlay; and left of image: this
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Oblong body with convex front and 2 drawers; raised on 4 straight tapering legs; rectangular lower shelf attaches  half way up legs; backsplash.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Serving Table of Mahogany and Inlay, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-77.
